sub_title: Data Analyst | Developer | Global Data Specialist
summary:
I am passionate about maintaining, collecting, analyzing, and reporting data, I am eager to learn and advance in my career.  Supporting the business is my true passion, and I thrive on contributing to its success.  I enjoy interacting with people on a social level, fostering strong working relationships.

Witnessing the actual benefits that come from my reports and data analysis is the most rewarding aspect of my job.

profile_positions.description:
As a member of the Supply Chain Improvement team for JDE Professional, responsible for the design, maintenance and operational execution of the global master data processes in the areas related to Customer, Material, Vendor and Finance.

Major Responsibilities and Activities: 
•	Lead the Supply Chain Improvement Project for Availability Checking
•	SAP Project Go-Live Lead for Supply Chain Improvement (Data)
•	Forms Creation for End Users (Excel + VBA)
•	Calculate Monthly KPI Measurements (Excel + VBA) + Dashboard Creation (Power BI) for KPI Measurement
•	Report Creation for Data Analysis (Alteryx + DVW ACS Tools) + Data Extraction (SAP) + VBA/Excel 
•	Systems Experience: SAP R/3, Sales Force Apttus, WinShuttle, Alteryx, Excel VBA 
•	Create / Maintain: Materials, Purchase Price Conditions, Sales Conditions
•	Create / Maintain: Batch Master, Configurations, Object Dependencies
profile_positions.title: Global Master Data Specialist / Data Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Lead a small highly skilled SAP master data team through a major SAP upgrade project ensuring data quality and SLA targets are maintained for over 25+ end markets (countries) worldwide. Ensure the correct management and controlling of master data, monitor and initiate actions which improve the quality of data,

Major Responsibilities and Activities: 
•	SAP Project: Ensure project deadlines are met + ensure market data is successfully migrated.
•	Writing new processes and procedures, train and coordinate training (master data team)
•	Conduct (semi)annual performance reviews, set annual goals. Selection / recruitment for the team.
•	Additive Costs, Procurement Alternatives and Mixing Ratio’s
•	Sales conditions, Excise and Duty settings and CMIR records.
•	Create purchasing information records and related conditions. Standard cost estimates. 
•	Automate processes and report generation. Provide end user support for 25+ end markets. 
•	Issue resolution, creation of test data, data extractions.
profile_positions.title: Senior Master Data Administrator / Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
Administration of master data in Kraton’s global SAP system and supply chain management system, Picaso.  The role uses an understanding of Kraton’s business processes and SAP based solutions to effectively maintain master data in its core supply chain (Picaso), customer fulfilment, procurement and quality management systems.

Major Responsibilities and Activities: 
•	Update SAP & Picaso master data against standards and within established authorizations. 
•	Develop and maintain documentation of procedures and processes for the management of master data.
•	Support operations staff with data related issues or questions. Key contact SAP.
•	Run reports and audit the quality of master data correcting data that is inconsistent 
•	Screen Kraton’s trading partners for compliance(internal standards and external regulatory requirements).
•	Maintain InfoPath Request forms; programming changes and publishing to SharePoint 
•	Maintain Data I/F from SAP to Picaso including working with the SAP team to correct programming issues.
profile_positions.title: SAP/Picaso Data Administrator

profile_positions.description:
On the project team that developed and implemented Kodak’s SAP functionality across 5 incorporated businesses and the integration of these businesses to form the new graphical branch of Kodak.

Major Responsibilities and Activities: 
•	Managing the teams. Schedule, deadlines and ensuring effective communication between IT and Business
•	Analyze business requirements. Create system requirement documents for approval by global management
•	Create design specifications for the modification of various legacy interfaces
•	Create functional specifications, report specification and configuration documents
•	Produce end user documentation, user acceptance tests and system integration tests
•	Technical issue resolution for R/3.  Application and testing of OSS notes, debugging SAP code
•	Logging OSS messages. Working directly with SAP. Configuration SAP IMG system. R/3 (MM, PP, ATP, MRP.
•	Creation of LIS structures and update rules. Provide end user training as needed
profile_positions.title: SAP Integrated Supply Chain System Analyst (United Kingdom)

profile_positions.description:
Directly involved in the initial SAP implementation as well as several global SAP rollouts participating in all areas from blue printing to go-live support.  Provided day to day technical support to the business in between implementations.

Major Responsibilities and Activities: 
•	Analyze business processes. Developing system specifications for SAP global implementations
•	Configuration of forecasting and demand planning in APO for distribution plants
•	Configuration of SAP IMG system for R/3 (PP/MM) and APO (GATP)
•	Creation functional specifications, report specification and configuration documents
•	Produce end user documentation, user acceptance tests and system integration tests
•	Create reports using ABAP Query including the creation of infosets with custom ABAP code as needed
•	Day to day operation of APO.  Resolve livecashe and integration issues with CRM and R/3
•	Technical issue resolution for APO and R/3 MRP, Production Planning, Material Master  
•	Application and testing of OSS notes, debugging SAP code, logging OSS messages. Directly with SAP
•	Developing and implementing new functionality to meet business requirements
•	MRP testing during SAP upgrade and validating BOM object dependencies for configurable materials
profile_positions.title: Global SAP System Analyst (Israel, South Africa and West Virginia)

profile_positions.description:
Major Responsibilities and Activities:

Planning and execution of MRP for multi-level highly complex bill of materials (configurable materials)
•	Production scheduling/rescheduling based on work center capacity
•	Expediting material shortages (production orders and purchase orders)
•	Maintain master data for bill of materials, work centers, and material master.
profile_positions.title: Production Planner
